about_the_game:
Escape from Chancellor's Chambers is a puzzle game with platforming elements where you play as a Wizard trying to escape from the many chambers below the chancellor's castle.

Solve puzzles, avoid traps, and find spells to help aid you in your escape. You may meet some interesting characters along the way!

This game includes 10 levels with many different types of puzzles to make you use every part of your brain to progress.

There are several spells that can help the player progress past challenges that were previously impossible.

There is an in-depth story that will try to pull in the player and teach them about the world and the characters inside it, including what roles they play.

name: Escape from Chancellor's Chambers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: A magical escape room experience that tests your skill with magic spells and puzzle solving! Do you have what it takes to get out of the Chancellor's Chambers?
